MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L17 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Lucerne Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground cable fault on Lucerne Street and we now expect your supply to be restored by 3am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:05AM on 7th February 2021
